Name: BalloonBoyBob
About the game: Bob is bold and brave, ready to go on an adventure through a black and white World full of dangers and mysteries. In the game You control the rotation of the screen and guide the main character to roll down, Bob can jump and overcome obstacles to do this, click the up arrow. Bob can cling to the surface for this you need to press the down arrow. Feature of game Convenient control. Smooth rotation, jumps and parkour. Ability to jump over obstacles. Original style and elaborate level design. A lot of interesting quests. Levers and switches. Doors, keys, and dangerous spikes. The Game has 70 levels!
